A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After the last one I expected very little. This one was great. Back to most of what I loved about Star Wars. Lovable characters\, deep while fun\, lots of cool environments\, eye candy\, awesome creatures and characters\, quotable\, interesting\, slightly unpredictable and totally fun. I did not feel like I was being patronized like the Force Awakens. The spark of hope for Star Wars has been reignited.
